entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
